it.polimi.se2018.network.server.rmi

Class RMIServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2018.network.server.AbstractServer
      • it.polimi.se2018.network.server.rmi.RMIServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IRMIServer, java.rmi.Remote

    public class RMIServer
extends AbstractServer
implements IRMIServer
    Class based on the Abstract Factory Design Pattern. The class define the RMI server for every single game. Extends AbstractServer abstract class in order to implement and facilitate Server connection.
    Author:
    DavideMammarella

    • Method Detail

      • startServer

        public void startServer(int port)
                 throws ServerSideException
        Starter for RMI Server. This method start the RMI Server after the RMI registry creation. RMI registry will be created and putted on listen on the assigned port. The RMI registry will exhibits services offered from server to client.
        Specified by:
        startServer in class AbstractServer
        Parameters:
        port - number of port that will be used on the connection (on when the registry will be on listen).
        Throws:
        ServerSideException

      • login

        public void login(java.lang.String nickname,
                  IRMIClient iRMIClient)
        Remote method used to log the user to the server with his nickname.
        Specified by:
        login in interface IRMIServer
        Parameters:
        nickname - name of the player.
        iRMIClient - client associated to the player.

      • disconnect

        public void disconnect(int id)
                throws java.io.IOException
        Remote method used to disconnect a client from the server.
        Specified by:
        disconnect in interface IRMIServer
        Parameters:
        id - id associated to the player.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • sendEventToController

        public void sendEventToController(EventController eventController)
        Remote method used to send to the server a request to unleash an event.
        Specified by:
        sendEventToController in interface IRMIServer
        Parameters:
        eventController - object that will use the server to unleash the event associated.

      • searchPlayerById

        public RemotePlayer searchPlayerById(int id)
        Method used to search a player on the RMI server.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        Remote Player associated to the id.
